=== Etymology ===
Shortened from {{der|zh|ja|-}} {{ja-r|花%蓮%港|^か%れん%こう}}, from {{der|zh|nan|-}} {{zh-m|洄瀾|Hôe-liân}} during Qing-era settlement in 1851. Formerly named {{zh-m|奇萊|tr=Kî-lâi}}, referring to the {{w|Sakiraya}} Taiwanese aborigines and their settlement.
